channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: NASA astronauts celebrate Thanksgiving with Russian cranberry sauce
item.description: NASA has made sure that the International Space Station is well stocked for a Thanksgiving meal full of treats. Here's what's on the menu.
item.content:encoded:
NASA has made sure that the International Space Station is well stocked for a Thanksgiving meal full of treats. Here's what's on the menu.

(Image credit: NASA webcast)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: Michel Martin reflects on Thanksgiving. And, revisit Susan Stamberg's cranberry relish
item.description: Thanksgiving has a complicated origin story, but it remains a great opportunity to express gratitude. Morning Edition host Michel Martin explains why that is.
item.content:encoded: Thanksgiving has a complicated origin story, but it remains a great opportunity to express gratitude. Morning Edition host Michel Martin explains why that is.
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: 'A giant game of chicken': Trump's Venezuela standoff edges toward conflict
item.description: As Washington escalates pressure on Venezuela, any push for regime change risks becoming a costly, dangerous gamble — not the quick fix President Trump might hope for.
item.content:encoded:
As Washington escalates pressure on Venezuela, any push for regime change risks becoming a costly, dangerous gamble — not the quick fix President Trump might hope for.

(Image credit: Jesus Vargas)
item.dc:creator: John Otis

item.title: This artist designs intricate suits of armor. The intended wearer? A humble mouse
item.description: Jeff de Boer has made an entire career out of crafting tiny plate armor. He's compelled by the idea of the underdog finding an edge; something so small being so well-protected.
item.content:encoded:
Jeff de Boer has made an entire career out of crafting tiny plate armor. He's compelled by the idea of the underdog finding an edge; something so small being so well-protected.

(Image credit: Chona Kasinger)
item.dc:creator: Deena Prichep

item.title: Mamdani and Trump made nice. NYC immigrants are still on edge.
item.description: The incoming Mayor of New York City has had a volatile relationship with President Trump. They recently had a surprisingly cordial meeting. New Yorkers say they are still feeling on edge.
item.content:encoded:
The incoming Mayor of New York City has had a volatile relationship with President Trump. They recently had a surprisingly cordial meeting. New Yorkers say they are still feeling on edge.

(Image credit: Timothy A. Clary)
item.dc:creator: Jasmine Garsd

item.title: For many, the holidays this year means having to make do with less
item.description: With job losses, food benefit reductions and higher prices, many in the U.S. are having to scrimp this holiday season.
item.content:encoded:
With job losses, food benefit reductions and higher prices, many in the U.S. are having to scrimp this holiday season.

(Image credit: Brandon Bell)
item.dc:creator: Tovia Smith

item.title: Pope Leo XIV embarks on first foreign trip, visiting Turkey and Lebanon
item.description: One journalist gifted Pope Leo XIV a Thanksgiving pumpkin pie as he began his first foreign tour to Turkey and Lebanon, accompanied by the world's press.
item.content:encoded:
One journalist gifted Pope Leo XIV a Thanksgiving pumpkin pie as he began his first foreign tour to Turkey and Lebanon, accompanied by the world's press.

(Image credit: Domenico Stinellis)
item.dc:creator: Ruth Sherlock

item.title: At least 55 killed, hundreds missing after Hong Kong high-rise blaze
item.description: A massive fire tore through a high-rise housing complex in Hong Kong on Wednesday. Authorities say at least 55 people have died in the fire and 279 people are still missing.
item.content:encoded: A massive fire tore through a high-rise housing complex in Hong Kong on Wednesday. Authorities say at least 55 people have died in the fire and 279 people are still missing.
item.dc:creator: Sherisse Pham

item.title: Trump defends key negotiator after leaked phone call appears to show him coaching Russia
item.description: A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine
item.content:encoded:
A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: 2 National Guard members in critical condition after 'targeted' attack in D.C., authorities say
item.description: President Trump said the suspected shooter came to the U.S. from Afghanistan in 2021. The administration plans to send 500 more Guard personnel to the nation's capital in response to the attack.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump said the suspected shooter came to the U.S. from Afghanistan in 2021. The administration plans to send 500 more Guard personnel to the nation's capital in response to the attack.

(Image credit: Tyrone Turner)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim
